S04n259:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ || [1]
S04n259:3: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S04n259:4: asti mañjuśrīrupariṣṭāyāmaparimitaguṇasaṃcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyu[r]jñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati | [2]
S04n259:8: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātramapi śroṣyanti yāvat pustakāgatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-cīvara-cchatra-dhvaja-ghaṇṭā-patākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣināyuṣaḥ punareva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti |
S04n259:9: ye khalu punarmañjuśriḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācaviṣyanti,
S04n259:11: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣāmapyāyurvivardhayiṣyati | [3]
S04n259:12: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrirdīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti teṣāṃ ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti | [4]
S04n259:13: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya,
S04n259:16: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā | [5]
S04n259:17: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecillikhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S04n259:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam | [7]
S04n259:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam | [8]
S04n259:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [9]
S04n259:28: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣītam | [10]
S04n259:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [11]
S04n259:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [12]
S04n259:34: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣattriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [13]
S04n259:36: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [14]
S04n259:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [15]
S04n259:40: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati |
S04n259:43: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācin narakeṣupapadyate na tiryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācidapi upapatsyate |
S04n259:45: tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati | [17]
S04n259:47: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti | [18]
S04n259:49: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti | [19]
S04n259:51: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti | [20]
S04n259:52: [Para. 21 is missing in the Sanskrit text.]
S04n259:55: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣā na rākṣasā nākālmṛtyuravataraṃ lapsyante | [22]
S04n259:57: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04n259:58: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
S04n259:61: nātm kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā | [23]
S04n259:64: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā rakṣāvaraṇāguptiṃ kariṣyanti | [24]
S04n259:66: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātav amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate | [25]
S04n259:70: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ karṇāpuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃbodhimabhisambhotsyante | [26]
S04n259:72: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācidapi bhaviṣyati | [27]
S04n259:74: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpanāṃ dānaṃdāsyati,
S04n259:75: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati | [28]
S04n259:80: yathā vipaśvi-śikhi-viśvabhu-krakucchanda-kanakamuni-kāśyapa-śākyamuni-prabhṛtīnaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskadhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
S04n259:81: na tvaparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum | [30]
S04n259:83: yathā sūmeroḥ parvatarājasya samānaṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
S04n259:91: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti | [33]
S04n259:94: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam || [34]
S04n259:96: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśantam ||[35]
S04n259:98: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[36]
S04n259:100: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[37]
S04n259:102: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[38]
S04n259:104: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[39]
S04n259:106: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandamiti | [40]
